title: Textile, "Summertime", 1989
medium:
Isolated tulips on shaded background with diagonal lines as if seen through the rain. 14 colors, blues, mauve and gray predominating.
Technique: Plain weave foundation.                                                    Discharge screen printed using 14 s
inscribed: along left selvedge: 14 color registration squares, arrow, " DESIGN JUTTA HUNEKE , JW, SUMMERTIME 100% CO" care symbols,. along right selvedge: 14 color registration squares.
dimensions:
Warp x Weft: 121.5 x 143.5 cm (47 13/16 x 56 1/2 in.)
Repeat H: 92 cm (36 1/4 in.)
description: Isolated tulips on shaded background with diagonal lines as if seen through the rain. 14 colors, blues, mauve and gray predominating.
